abstract: Will Poole, a veteran Microsoft executive, is leaving to focus on non-profit pursuits. His first new project: $70 computers for schoolchildren.
snippet: Will Poole, a veteran Microsoft executive, is leaving to focus on non-profit pursuits. His first new project: $70 computers for schoolchildren.
lead_paragraph: Will Poole, a veteran Microsoft executive, is leaving the company at the end of this month to become a technology evangelist of sorts. Computing, he says, is finally becoming sufficiently powerful and inexpensive enough that it can really help tackle “social and economic problems and has the potential to do it at scale.”

headline.main: Microsoft Refugee Becomes a Social Technologist
